trans-unit.source: Represents a serializable collection of service metadata in XML form.
trans-unit.target: A szerializálható XML formában a szolgáltatás metaadatai gyűjteményét képviseli.

trans-unit.source: The MetadataSet class contains a collection of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> objects, each of which contains one dialect of metadata in XML form.
trans-unit.target: A MetadataSet osztály gyűjteményét tartalmazza <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>objektumok, amelyek mindegyike tartalmazza XML formában metaadatok egy dialektus.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the MetadataSet class is used to pass a group of XML metadata documents to and from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter> objects, such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>.
trans-unit.target: Általában a MetadataSet osztály felelt meg az XML-metaadatok dokumentumok és az <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter> <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter>objektumok, például <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter>és <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter> csoport használatos

trans-unit.source: To create a MetadataSet from a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> object of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Egy a MetadataSet létrehozásához egy <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>típusú objektum <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, használja a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.%23ctor%2A>konstruktor.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>

trans-unit.source: To obtain a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> object of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.MetadataSections%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Az beszerzése egy <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>típusú objektum <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, használja a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.MetadataSections%2A>tulajdonság.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.MetadataSections%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.ReadFrom%2A> method to load a MetadataSet from XML data and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.WriteTo%2A> method to write the internal metadata to an XML format.
trans-unit.target: Ezenkívül használhatja a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.ReadFrom%2A>metódus egy MetadataSet betöltése a következő XML-adatok és a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.WriteTo%2A>metódus a belső metaadatok írni az XML-formátuma.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.WriteTo%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.ReadFrom%2A>

trans-unit.source: This type implements the structure defined in the WS-MetadataExchange specification.
trans-unit.target: Ez a típus megvalósítja a WS-MetadataExchange definiált szerkezetének.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> object.
trans-unit.target: Létrehoz egy új <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>objektum.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> class that contains the specified collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> osztályt, amely tartalmazza a megadott objektumgyűjtemény <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> objektumok.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> from `sections`.
trans-unit.target: Létrehoz egy új <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>a `sections`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>

trans-unit.source: The metadata values that the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> is to contain.
trans-unit.target: A metaadatok értékeknek a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> kell tartalmaznia.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"></xref> objects that appear in the serialized form of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a gyűjteménye <xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"> </xref> objektumok, amelyek a szerializált űrlap megjelenik a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"></xref> objects that appear in the serialized form of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"> </xref> objektumok, amelyek a szerializált űrlap megjelenik a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> objects that represents the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a gyűjteménye <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> a metaadatok képviselő objektum.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> objects that represents the metadata.
trans-unit.target: A gyűjtemény <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> a metaadatok képviselő objektum.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> from the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object.
trans-unit.target: Értéket ad vissza egy <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> a megadott <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objektum.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> from an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object.
trans-unit.target: Létrehoz egy <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>a egy <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objektum.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>

trans-unit.source: The reader to read in XML.
trans-unit.target: Az olvasó olvassa el az XML-Fájlban.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> that contains all the metadata present in the XML stream.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> , amely tartalmazza az XML-adatfolyama szerepel minden metaadat.

trans-unit.source: The reader is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az olvasó <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Implements <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema*> method to provide serialization support.
trans-unit.target: Megvalósítja <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema*>támogatásához a szerializálási metódus.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema*>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> Beolvasása

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object that describes the XML representation of the object that is produced by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.System%23Xml%23Serialization%23IXmlSerializable%23WriteXml%2A> method and accessed by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.System%23Xml%23Serialization%23IXmlSerializable%23ReadXml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Értéket ad vissza a <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>objektum, amely az objektum által létrehozott XML-ábrázolása ismerteti a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.System%23Xml%23Serialization%23IXmlSerializable%23WriteXml%2A> metódus, és a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.System%23Xml%23Serialization%23IXmlSerializable%23ReadXml%2A> metódus.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml*> method to support deserialization from XML.
trans-unit.target: Megvalósítja a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml*>metódus az XML-deszerializálás támogatására.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml*>

trans-unit.source: The reader to use when reading XML.
trans-unit.target: Az olvasó XML olvasásához.

trans-unit.source: The reader is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az olvasó <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml*> method to support serialization to XML.
trans-unit.target: Megvalósítja a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml*>metódus XML-szerializálási támogatásához.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml*>

trans-unit.source: The writer to use when writing XML.
trans-unit.target: Az író XML írásához használt.

trans-unit.source: The writer is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az író egy <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Writes the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> to XML using the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Írja a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> XML-a megadott <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> használatával

trans-unit.source: Writes a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> to an XML stream.
trans-unit.target: Ír egy <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>egy XML-adatfolyam.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>

trans-unit.source: The writer to use to write the XML.
trans-unit.target: Az író írni az XML-fájl használatára.

trans-unit.source: The writer is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az író egy <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
